definition: Person other than: (a) consumer; (b) controller; (c) processor; or (d) affiliate of controller or processor
relationships_to_other_actors: Receives personal data via Sale from controller; Receives personal data via sharing/disclosure from controller; Not directly bound by consumer's original consent to controller; May become controller in own right for data received
cpa_direct_obligations: Limited direct CPA obligations; Not subject to controller duties unless acting as controller for received data
controller_liability: Controller remains liable for third-party misuse if controller violates CPA in transfer; Controller must conduct DPA before sale to third party
